ingredients.ingredient: 4 garlic cloves (12g), grated or chopped finely
low sodium chicken broth, as needed
1 lb (453g) raw peeled shrimp, tails off
2 Tbsp (88g) lime juice - fresh or jarred

instructions.instruction: Add garlic, red pepper and smoked paprika to a skillet.
Add just enough chicken broth to keep garlic from burning, and saute over med heat until garlic just starts to brown.
Increase heat to medium-high and add shrimp; cook until color changes to pink - 2 or 3 minutes.
Add in lime juice and salt and pepper.
Remove from heat and toss in fresh cilantro.
Sprinkle with more crushed red pepper if you like it extra spicy!

ingredients.ingredient: 2 1/2 lb celery (1.12 KG), cut into 2‚Äù chunks
8-10 whole thyme sprigs, plus chopped thyme leaves to garnish

instructions.instruction: Tie thyme sprigs together with kitchen twine (makes it easier to remove them later).
Add celery through thyme sprigs to a large stockpot.
Bring mixture to a simmer; cover and cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until celery is very soft.
Reduce heat as needed so that you keep a very gentle simmer.
Remove from the heat, discard the thyme sprigs and stir in salt and pepper.
